preface.title: Preface
preface.para: This document describes new features and changes for the Cloud Big Data API.
For detailed information about the Cloud Big Data API, see the following documentation at docs.rackspace.com:

preface.para: Support for Cloud Big Data is available 24x7x365 via phone or chat, or by filing a ticket. For more information, see Rackspace Cloud Essentials - Getting Fanatical Support.
You can also provide feedback by using the Product Feedback forum.
Rackspace welcomes your comments, feedback, and bug reports.

chapter.title: June 2, 2014
chapter.para: This release is the initial General Availability (GA) release of the Cloud Big Data API.

Rackspace is pleased to announce the General Availability release of Rackspace Cloud Big Data. The Service Level Agreement (SLA) for Cloud Big Data is available at http://www.rackspace.com/cloud/legal/sla. Your use through the API will be billed according to the pricing schedule at http://www.rackspace.com/cloud/big-data/pricing.

chapter.title: February 3, 2014
chapter.para: This release of the Cloud Big Data API includes Role Based Access Control (RBAC).

Role Based Access Control (RBAC) restricts access to the capabilities of Rackspace Cloud services, including the Cloud Big Data API, to authorized users only. RBAC enables Rackspace Cloud customers to specify which account users of their Cloud account have access to which Cloud Big Data API service capabilities, based on roles defined by Rackspace. The permissions to perform certain operations in Cloud Big Data API – create, read, update, delete – are assigned to specific roles, and these roles can be assigned by the Cloud account admin user to account users of the account.
For more information, see the section on RBAC in the Cloud Big Data Developer Guide.

chapter.title: January 14, 2014
chapter.para: This release is the initial Limited Availability (LA) release of the Cloud Big Data API.

Rackspace is pleased to announce the Limited Availability release of Rackspace Cloud Big Data. The Limited Availability program enables customers and Rackers to test an early version of the product and provide feedback on the product and capabilities. Customers are screened as part of the on-boarding process to ensure correct product/customer fit. The Service Level Agreement (SLA) for Cloud Big Data is available at http://www.rackspace.com/cloud/legal/sla.

chapter.title: September 16, 2013
chapter.para: This release is the initial Early Access (EA) release of the Cloud Big Data API.

Rackspace is pleased to announce the Early Access release of Rackspace Cloud Big Data. The Early Access program enables customers and Rackers, by invitation, to test an early version of the product and provide feedback on the product and its capabilities. The Cloud Big Data Early Access program is a preproduction service offering covered by the Beta Services terms (rackspace.com/information/legal/testterms/) in the Rackspace Cloud Terms of Service.
